title: #9 Toucan
description: We've got a new Zoodle for you and this time, we're drawing a Toco Toucan! Share your art with us by using #BronxZoodles.

title: #8 Mandrill
description: In honor of Boo at the Zoo and in celebration of the season, we proudly present a special, spooktacular Boo at the Zoodle! Grab your markers and crayons, and let's get drawing!

title: #7 Ameican Bison
description: We can't wait to open the zoo! Before we welcome you back in person, here's another Zoodle to get you excited about one of our favorite animals: the American bison! #bronxzoodles

title: #6 Sand Tiger Shark
description: To celebrate World Oceans Day we're learning to draw a sand tiger shark with this week's #BronxZoodle!

title: #5 Tapir
description: Happy Mother's Day to all the incredible moms out there. To celebrate, we're featuring an outrageously cute mother/baby duo from the Animal Kingdom in this week's drawing tutorial: tapirs! Be sure to tag us with #BronxZoodles.

title: #4 Aldabra Tortoise
description: Time for another drawing tutorial, this time we're bringing you an Aldabra tortoise! Be sure to share your art with us using #BronxZoodles.

title: #3 Sea Lion
description: Time for another drawing tutorial! This time, we're bringing you a sea lion. Be sure to share your art with us using #BronxZoodles!

title: #2 Black-footed Penguin
description: Ready for another drawing tutorial? This time we're creating black-footed penguins, like the ones we have at the New York Aquarium! Be sure to share your creations with us using #bronxzoodles!

title: #1 Red Panda
description: We know you have extra time on your hands, why not use it to become a master artist? Or at least learn how to draw a red panda. Follow along with our tutorial and be sure to tag us in the finished products using #BronxZoodles!
